human haiku:
Waves crash with a might,
Secrets held in deep blue dreams, 
Eternal rhythm.

Golden beams arise,
Awakening a quiet hope,
A new day is born.

Crimson and gold fall, 
Whispering tales of change,
Nature's soft farewell.

Majestic and silent, 
Peaks carved by time and whispers, 
Guardians of the sky.
